home.cta: Click one of the options below to get started.

details.title: Incident Details
details.incident-location-hint: Eg. East Sooke Park, Magdalena Point.
details.no-case-number: No case number for training incidents. If this were a real incident, you would enter the case number here.
details.failed: Failed to create the incident. You may want to try again or use SARTopo directly without SARTeam.
